text: Kate Spade during an interview in New York. ( Photo : Bebeto Matthews, AP ) Under rainy skies, designer Kate Spade was laid to rest in her hometown of Kansas City on Thursday. Hundreds of mourners gathered at Our Lady of Perpetual Help Parish Redemptorist Church, with many clutching their Kate Spade bags in tribute, according to the Kansas City Star. Tragically, Spade's father, Earl F. Brosnahan, Jr. died Wednesday night at the age of 89. A family spokesman said he had been ` ` in failing health of late and was heartbroken over the recent death of his beloved daughter.'' Actress Rachel Brosnahan, his granddaughter, paid tribute to him in an Instagram post late Thursday that also mentioned Spade. ` ` He
